sect1.title: JAMSExecInfo
sect1.subtitle: component for displaying simulation progress and info output

row.entry: Number of invocations of this component

sect2.title: Component Description
sect2.para: This component creates a GUI panel showing a progress bar and a window containing the information log output. This component is meant to be used within a temporal or spatial context, showing the progress of the context's iteration. The number of iterations can be provided via the counter attribute. If this stays empty, the surrounding context's iteration count is used instead.
